Activity: Wake up and get energized! Log into the EHR system and check for any urgent messages or updates. Grab a coffee.
Review the daily schedule, check which patient have influenza symptoms.
Greet patients with a friendly smile and conduct the influenza symptom assessment using the standardized protocols and tools integrated into the EHR.
Accurately and completely enter the patient's data into the EHR. Double-check to avoid errors.
Second patient. Repeat the process. Make sure you show your patience.
Document data into EHR
Time for some fun. Let's browse some funny nursing stories online and laugh for a while!
Third patient! Let's go!
Document data into the EHR
Lunch Time! Having lunch with coworkers!
Patient assessment and EHR entry. Making sure everything is in the EHR system!
More patient interactions and data entry.
Patient assessment and Documentation
EHR data entry!
Patient assessment and EHR entry.
Documenting the data!
Check with @RN-1,@RN-2 and @RN-3 to discuss challenges regarding patient assessment, Subject: Discussion on Patient Assessment
Review all EHR entries for the day, ensuring accuracy and completeness. Fix any errors in the EHR.
Prepare for tomorrow by reviewing patient schedules and anticipating potential needs.
Time to clock out and head home!
